short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to enable you to set secure passwords for Chrome users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Protect your Chrome credentials with a password extension! This simple utility will help you generate a master password and store your bookmarks, history, and saved logins.  Search “Chrome password setting” extension in the Chrome Web Store for the list of the most reliable providers and continue surfing without worries! You can do this quickly, making your online privacy a lot better. 


Some key Features of Chrome Password Setting Chrome Extension 

Easy Password Generation: It is very easy to generate powerful and distinctive passwords within a few clicks. 
 

Secure Storage: Restore, history, and saved login credentials with encrypted storage. 
 

Master Password Protection: This means you need to safeguard all your credentials using this one master password. 
 

Quick Setup: Easy to install and set up in a matter of minutes to protect you instantly. 
 

How to Use in Simple Steps 

Step 1: Installation 

Type Chrome Web Store in your browser, look for the “Chrome password setting” app and click the “Add to Chrome” button. 

Step 2: Setting Up the Master Password 

It is advisable to install the extension and form a secure master password to access the extension. This will protect all the stored credentials. 

Step 3: Save Your Credentials 

Start storing your bookmarks, histories, and login information inside the extension. For your security all your data will be encrypted. 
 

Step 4: Manage Passwords 

To create new passwords, you can use the extension and when you next log into the websites, the extension will safely input the passwords for you. 

 

FAQs 

Q1: What can I do if I forgot my master password? 
 
No, the master password cannot be recovered for security measures taken against a hacker or a malicious individual. Either it must be remembered, or it should be kept safely. 
 
Q2: This extension works on other browsers? 
 
It also will not work in other browsers as the extension is made for Google Chrome only. 
 
Q3: Is my data saved in cyberspace? 
 
No, all your data is stored locally on your device and your data is encrypted to prevent unauthorized access.
